content:
Hey Folks - anyone used / know of a NuGet package I can use in C# to parse GitHub Flavored Markdown to HTML for the Card Detail?
I've tried a few of the Markdown packages - CommonMark.NET, Markdig, MarkdownDeep, MarkdownSharp, MarkedNet etc. However, I could not make them understand the GitHub markdown - they all seem to be set up for CommonMark.
Donâ€™t they have a flag for gfm? At least some of them do...
